tool_description: The FoxImageRandomizer API is a delightful service that offers a collection of random fox images with each request. Whether you're an animal lover, developer, or simply looking to add a touch of cuteness to your applications, this API is the perfect choice.
name: FoxImageRandomizer API
title: FoxImageRandomizer API

api_list.name: getFoxImage
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://foximagerandomizer-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "foximagerandomizer-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://foximagerandomizer-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
